name: Yarua (V)
Lore: 'Kashyyyk''s senior Wookiee senator. Believes that a thorough taxation plan will assist funding of other worthwhile Republic programs. Despises the corruption around him.',
Text: 'Agenda: taxation. All Nudjs are lost. At end of your deploy phase, if with a Wookiee on Kashyyyk and you have 8 or more cards in hand, opponent loses 1 Force. Your Wookiees on Kashyyyk move for free using their landspeed.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
